comments:
This problem occurs in Europa (Eclipse 3.3) only.

Repro:

1) Copy RDB 1.5.5 component into WTP 2.0 prerequisites.
2) Start Eclipse.
3) Open Windows-> Preferences and select the Data node.

Result:
An exception is thrown in the Error log and preference page does not display correctly.

Expected result:
No error and the page displays properly.

Here is the stack trace:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Argument cannot be null
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3531)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3465)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3436)
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.GC.setBackground(GC.java:3846)
	at org.eclipse.wst.rdb.core.internal.ui.preferences.PreferencePage$LabelPainter.fillColor(PreferencePage.java:101)
	at org.eclipse.wst.rdb.core.internal.ui.preferences.PreferencePage$LabelPainter.paintControl(PreferencePage.java:121)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TypedListener.handleEvent(TypedListener.java:216)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.EventTable.sendEvent(EventTable.java:66)
